989364231073091585.text: On May 31st 2018 TLS 1.1 support will be removed from our APIs. If you are using a modern browser or HTTP client this requires no action on your part. We are doing this to ensure users on the web remain secure. If you are running an HTTPS endpoint we hope you'll to do the same.
